casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alexander C. POLKE. No. 412A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2006. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Alexander Charles Polke. Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of July 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 31st day of July 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of July 2006."
